item.title: Bandai Namco Online to be absorbed by Bandai Namco Entertainment
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/11/bandai-namco-online-to-be-absorbed-by-bandai-namco-entertainment

Bandai Namco Entertainment to take over existing titles and businesses.

Bandai Namco Online will be absorbed by Bandai Namco Entertainment in an absorption-type merger on April 1, 2025, the companies announced.

Bandai Namco Online was established in 2009 as a spin-off of Bandai Namco Entertainment, and has released titles such as Gundam Evolution and Blue Protocol. Gundam Evolution has since shut down, and Blue Protocol will shut down on January 18, 2025.

Other titles and businesses operated by Bandai Namco Online, such as Idolish Seven, SD Gundam Operations, and Gundam Tribe, will be taken over by Bandai Namco Entertainment following the absorption.

item.title: Puella Magi Madoka Magica: Magia Exedra delayed to spring 2025
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/11/puella-magi-madoka-magica-magia-exedra-delayed-to-spring-2025

  • PC
  • Smartphone

Free-to-play RPG no longer due out in 2024.

Publisher Aniplex and developers Pokelabo and f4samurai have delayed free-to-play RPG Puella Magi Madoka Magica: Magia Exedra from its previously planned 2024 release window to spring 2025 worldwide. It will be available for PC via Steam, iOS, and Android.

Get the full message from the development team on the delay below.

The release date for Puella Magi Madoka Magica: Magia Exedra, previously scheduled for 2024, has been changed to spring 2025.

To deliver the best possible gaming experience based on this beloved series, we have revised our development schedule to ensure even higher quality in the final game.

We sincerely apologize for this delay.

Our team is working diligently towards a release that will exceed player expectations, and we thank you for your patience.‚Äù

November 20, 2024
Puella Magi Madoka Magica: Magia Exedra Production Team
